localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Power People Platform is a free design library of 3D avatars. Made with love ❤️ for more fun and color in your work. They are perfect for your mockups, presentations, storyboards or any other creative project you are working on. Available as Photoshop files.
blogPost.body: Power People Platform is a free design library of 3D avatars. Made with love ❤️ for more fun and color in your work. They are perfect for your mockups, presentations, storyboards or any other creative project you are working on. Available as Photoshop files.
blogPost.title: Power People Platform - Free illustration library of 3D avatars - Made with love ❤️
blogPost.author: Lisa Broedlin

localize.description: 动力人平台是一款免费的3D头像设计库。用爱制造❤️为你的工作带来更多乐趣和色彩。它们非常适合您的模拟图，演示文稿，故事板或您正在进行的任何其他创意项目。可作为Photoshop文件。
localize.tagline: 免费的3D头像插画库--用爱做的❤️

localize.description: 動力人平臺是一款免費的3D頭像設計庫。用愛製造❤️爲你的工作帶來更多樂趣和色彩。它們非常適合您的模擬圖，演示文稿，故事板或您正在進行的任何其他創意項目。可作爲Photoshop文件。
localize.tagline: 免費的3D頭像插畫庫--用愛做的❤️

previous.excerpt: Rysolv provides a platform for users to share issues, contribute to open source, and get paid for their work. 💸 Anyone can create an issue or contribute towards a bounty. Whoever submits a solution closing out the issue earns the bounty.
previous.title: rysolv - Fix open source issues, get paid

localize.description: Rysolv 为用户提供了一个分享问题、为开源做贡献并获得报酬的平台。💸任何人都可以创建一个问题或为赏金做出贡献。谁提交了结束问题的解决方案，谁就能获得赏金。
localize.tagline: 修复开源问题，获得报酬

localize.description: Rysolv 爲用戶提供了一個分享問題、爲開源做貢獻並獲得報酬的平臺。💸任何人都可以創建一個問題或爲賞金做出貢獻。誰提交了結束問題的解決方案，誰就能獲得賞金。
localize.tagline: 修復開源問題，獲得報酬

next.excerpt: TweetPik is a web app that allows you to create easily convert tweets to images SVG, PNG and JPG. Adjust the size, theme and elements on the screen.
next.title: TweetPik - Easily convert tweets to images SVG, PNG and JPG

localize.description: TweetPik是一款网络应用，它允许你轻松创建将推文转换为图片SVG，PNG和JPG。调整大小，主题和屏幕上的元素。
localize.tagline: 轻松地将推文转换为图像SVG，PNG和JPG。

localize.description: TweetPik是一款網絡應用，它允許你輕鬆創建將推文轉換爲圖片SVG，PNG和JPG。調整大小，主題和屏幕上的元素。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆地將推文轉換爲圖像SVG，PNG和JPG。
